/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by brick buildings, their red and brown hues adding a touch of warmth to the urban landscape. Trees line the street, their green leaves contrasting with the brick facades and adding a touch of nature to the cityscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. People can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The image is bathed in natural light, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
